items.label: lem-derivative-locality-c3
items.title: Derivative Locality for Third Derivatives (Complete)
items.content:
471: :label: lem-derivative-locality-c3
472: 
473: For walkers $i, j \in \mathcal{A}$ with $i \neq j$, the companion-dependent measurement $d_j = \sum_{\ell \in \mathcal{A} \setminus \{j\}} \mathbb{P}(c(j) = \ell) \cdot d_{\text{alg}}(j, \ell)$ satisfies:
474: 
475: **First derivative**:
476: $$
477: \nabla_{x_i} d_j = P_{ji} A_{ji} \nabla_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)
478: $$
479: 
480: where $P_{ji} = \mathbb{P}(c(j)=i)$ and $A_{ji} = 1 - \frac{d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)(d_{\text{alg}}(j,i) - d_j)}{\varepsilon_c^2}$.
481: 
482: **KEY INSIGHT**: In the sum over companions $\ell \in \mathcal{A} \setminus \{j\}$, only the term **$\ell = i$** contributes to $\nabla_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j, \ell)$ because $d_{\text{alg}}(j,\ell)$ depends only on $(x_j, v_j, x_\ell, v_\ell)$, not on $(x_i, v_i)$ for $\ell \neq i$.
483: 
484: **Derivative bounds** (using $d_{\text{alg}}(j,i) = \sqrt{\|x_j - x_i\|^2 + \lambda_{\text{alg}}\|v_j - v_i\|^2 + \varepsilon_d^2}$):
485: $$
486: \|\nabla_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)\| \leq 1, \quad \|\nabla^2_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)\| \leq \frac{2}{\varepsilon_d}, \quad \|\nabla^3_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)\| \leq \frac{6}{\varepsilon_d^2}
487: $$
488: 
489: **Bounds for companion-dependent measurement** (with $P_{ji} \leq 1$ and $|A_{ji}| \leq 1 + D_{\max}^2/\varepsilon_c^2$):
490: $$
491: \|\nabla_{x_i} d_j\| \leq C_{d,1} := 1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}
492: $$
493: $$
494: \|\nabla^2_{x_i} d_j\| \leq C_{d,2} \varepsilon_d^{-1} \quad \text{where} \quad C_{d,2} = 2\left(1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}\right) + \frac{3D_{\max}^3}{\varepsilon_c^4}
495: $$
496: $$
497: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} d_j\| \leq C_{d,3} \varepsilon_d^{-2} \quad \text{where} \quad C_{d,3} = 6\left(1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}\right) + \frac{15D_{\max}^3}{\varepsilon_c^4}
498: $$
items.raw_directive:
468: #### 2.5.4. Derivative Locality Lemma (KEY for k-Uniformity)
469: 
470: :::{prf:lemma} Derivative Locality for Third Derivatives (Complete)
471: :label: lem-derivative-locality-c3
472: 
473: For walkers $i, j \in \mathcal{A}$ with $i \neq j$, the companion-dependent measurement $d_j = \sum_{\ell \in \mathcal{A} \setminus \{j\}} \mathbb{P}(c(j) = \ell) \cdot d_{\text{alg}}(j, \ell)$ satisfies:
474: 
475: **First derivative**:
476: $$
477: \nabla_{x_i} d_j = P_{ji} A_{ji} \nabla_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)
478: $$
479: 
480: where $P_{ji} = \mathbb{P}(c(j)=i)$ and $A_{ji} = 1 - \frac{d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)(d_{\text{alg}}(j,i) - d_j)}{\varepsilon_c^2}$.
481: 
482: **KEY INSIGHT**: In the sum over companions $\ell \in \mathcal{A} \setminus \{j\}$, only the term **$\ell = i$** contributes to $\nabla_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j, \ell)$ because $d_{\text{alg}}(j,\ell)$ depends only on $(x_j, v_j, x_\ell, v_\ell)$, not on $(x_i, v_i)$ for $\ell \neq i$.
483: 
484: **Derivative bounds** (using $d_{\text{alg}}(j,i) = \sqrt{\|x_j - x_i\|^2 + \lambda_{\text{alg}}\|v_j - v_i\|^2 + \varepsilon_d^2}$):
485: $$
486: \|\nabla_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)\| \leq 1, \quad \|\nabla^2_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)\| \leq \frac{2}{\varepsilon_d}, \quad \|\nabla^3_{x_i} d_{\text{alg}}(j,i)\| \leq \frac{6}{\varepsilon_d^2}
487: $$
488: 
489: **Bounds for companion-dependent measurement** (with $P_{ji} \leq 1$ and $|A_{ji}| \leq 1 + D_{\max}^2/\varepsilon_c^2$):
490: $$
491: \|\nabla_{x_i} d_j\| \leq C_{d,1} := 1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}
492: $$
493: $$
494: \|\nabla^2_{x_i} d_j\| \leq C_{d,2} \varepsilon_d^{-1} \quad \text{where} \quad C_{d,2} = 2\left(1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}\right) + \frac{3D_{\max}^3}{\varepsilon_c^4}
495: $$
496: $$
497: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} d_j\| \leq C_{d,3} \varepsilon_d^{-2} \quad \text{where} \quad C_{d,3} = 6\left(1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}\right) + \frac{15D_{\max}^3}{\varepsilon_c^4}
498: $$
499:

items.label: lem-self-measurement-derivatives
items.title: Self-Measurement Derivative Bounds (j=i Case)
items.content:
617: :label: lem-self-measurement-derivatives
618: 
619: For the self-measurement where walker $i$ selects a companion from the alive set:
620: 
621: $$
622: d_i = \sum_{\ell \in \mathcal{A} \setminus \{i\}} P_{i\ell} \, d_{\text{alg}}(i,\ell), \quad P_{i\ell} = \frac{\exp(-d_{i\ell}^2/(2\varepsilon_c^2))}{Z_i}
623: $$
624: 
625: the third derivative with respect to walker $i$'s position is **k-uniform** despite the sum over $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)} = O((\log k)^d)$ companions.
626: 
627: **Key Mechanism**: The normalization $\sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} = 1$ ensures all derivatives are **probability-weighted expectations**, canceling the sum over companions.
628: 
629: **First derivative** (covariance form):
630: 
631: $$
632: \nabla_{x_i} d_i = \mathbb{E}_{P_i}[\nabla_{x_i} d_{i\ell}] - \text{Cov}_{P_i}(d_{i\ell}, S_{i\ell})
633: $$
634: 
635: where $S_{i\ell} := \frac{d_{i\ell}}{\varepsilon_c^2} \nabla_{x_i} d_{i\ell}$.
636: 
637: **Third derivative** (expectation form):
638: 
639: $$
640: \begin{aligned}
641: \nabla^3_{x_i} d_i &= \sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} \nabla^3 d_{i\ell}
642: + 3\,\text{sym}\sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} (\Delta_{i\ell} \otimes \nabla^2 d_{i\ell}) \\
643: &\quad + 3\,\text{sym}\sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} [(\Delta_{i\ell} \otimes \Delta_{i\ell}) + \Gamma_{i\ell}] \otimes \nabla d_{i\ell} \\
644: &\quad + \sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} [\Delta_{i\ell}^{\otimes 3} + \text{sym}(\Delta_{i\ell} \otimes \Gamma_{i\ell}) + \Xi_{i\ell}] d_{i\ell}
645: \end{aligned}
646: $$
647: 
648: where $\Delta_{i\ell} = \bar{S}_i - S_{i\ell}$ with $\bar{S}_i = \sum_r P_{ir} S_{ir}$ (expectation), and $\Gamma_{i\ell}, \Xi_{i\ell}$ are derivatives of $\Delta_{i\ell}$ (also expectations).
649: 
650: **Bounds** (using $\|\nabla d_{i\ell}\| \leq 1$, $\|\nabla^2 d_{i\ell}\| \leq 2/\varepsilon_d$, $\|\nabla^3 d_{i\ell}\| \leq 6/\varepsilon_d^2$, $d_{i\ell} \leq D_{\max}$):
651: 
652: $$
653: \|\nabla_{x_i} d_i\| \leq C_{d,1} := 1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}
654: $$
655: 
656: $$
657: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} d_i\| \leq C_{d,3} \varepsilon_d^{-2} \quad \text{with} \quad C_{d,3} = 6\left(1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}\right) + \frac{15 D_{\max}^3}{\varepsilon_c^4}
658: $$
items.raw_directive:
614: ### 2.6. Two-Scale Framework for k-Uniformity
615: 
616: :::{prf:lemma} Self-Measurement Derivative Bounds (j=i Case)
617: :label: lem-self-measurement-derivatives
618: 
619: For the self-measurement where walker $i$ selects a companion from the alive set:
620: 
621: $$
622: d_i = \sum_{\ell \in \mathcal{A} \setminus \{i\}} P_{i\ell} \, d_{\text{alg}}(i,\ell), \quad P_{i\ell} = \frac{\exp(-d_{i\ell}^2/(2\varepsilon_c^2))}{Z_i}
623: $$
624: 
625: the third derivative with respect to walker $i$'s position is **k-uniform** despite the sum over $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\varepsilon_c)} = O((\log k)^d)$ companions.
626: 
627: **Key Mechanism**: The normalization $\sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} = 1$ ensures all derivatives are **probability-weighted expectations**, canceling the sum over companions.
628: 
629: **First derivative** (covariance form):
630: 
631: $$
632: \nabla_{x_i} d_i = \mathbb{E}_{P_i}[\nabla_{x_i} d_{i\ell}] - \text{Cov}_{P_i}(d_{i\ell}, S_{i\ell})
633: $$
634: 
635: where $S_{i\ell} := \frac{d_{i\ell}}{\varepsilon_c^2} \nabla_{x_i} d_{i\ell}$.
636: 
637: **Third derivative** (expectation form):
638: 
639: $$
640: \begin{aligned}
641: \nabla^3_{x_i} d_i &= \sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} \nabla^3 d_{i\ell}
642: + 3\,\text{sym}\sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} (\Delta_{i\ell} \otimes \nabla^2 d_{i\ell}) \\
643: &\quad + 3\,\text{sym}\sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} [(\Delta_{i\ell} \otimes \Delta_{i\ell}) + \Gamma_{i\ell}] \otimes \nabla d_{i\ell} \\
644: &\quad + \sum_{\ell} P_{i\ell} [\Delta_{i\ell}^{\otimes 3} + \text{sym}(\Delta_{i\ell} \otimes \Gamma_{i\ell}) + \Xi_{i\ell}] d_{i\ell}
645: \end{aligned}
646: $$
647: 
648: where $\Delta_{i\ell} = \bar{S}_i - S_{i\ell}$ with $\bar{S}_i = \sum_r P_{ir} S_{ir}$ (expectation), and $\Gamma_{i\ell}, \Xi_{i\ell}$ are derivatives of $\Delta_{i\ell}$ (also expectations).
649: 
650: **Bounds** (using $\|\nabla d_{i\ell}\| \leq 1$, $\|\nabla^2 d_{i\ell}\| \leq 2/\varepsilon_d$, $\|\nabla^3 d_{i\ell}\| \leq 6/\varepsilon_d^2$, $d_{i\ell} \leq D_{\max}$):
651: 
652: $$
653: \|\nabla_{x_i} d_i\| \leq C_{d,1} := 1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}
654: $$
655: 
656: $$
657: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} d_i\| \leq C_{d,3} \varepsilon_d^{-2} \quad \text{with} \quad C_{d,3} = 6\left(1 + \frac{D_{\max}^2}{\varepsilon_c^2}\right) + \frac{15 D_{\max}^3}{\varepsilon_c^4}
658: $$
659:

items.label: lem-weight-third-derivative
items.title: Third Derivative of Localization Weights
items.content:
1050: :label: lem-weight-third-derivative
1051: 
1052: The localization weights $w_{ij}(\rho) = K_\rho(x_i, x_j) / Z_i(\rho)$ where $Z_i(\rho) = \sum_{\ell \in A_k} K_\rho(x_i, x_\ell)$ satisfy:
1053: $$
1054: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} w_{ij}(\rho)\| \le C_{w,3}(\rho)
1055: $$
1056: 
1057: where
1058: $$
1059: C_{w,3}(\rho) := \frac{C_{\nabla^3 K}(\rho)}{\rho^3} + \frac{12 C_{\nabla K}(\rho) C_{\nabla^2 K}(\rho)}{\rho^3} + \frac{16 C_{\nabla K}(\rho)^3}{\rho^3}
1060: $$
items.raw_directive:
1047: where $d_{\text{alg}}(i,j) = \sqrt{\|x_i - x_j\|^2 + \lambda_{\text{alg}}\|v_i - v_j\|^2 + \varepsilon_d^2}$ (from §2.5.1). The weights $w_{ij} = K_\rho(i,j) / Z_i$ do NOT involve companion selection (they use direct pairwise distances), so the quotient analysis below applies with minor adaptations. The key difference: derivatives of $K_\rho$ now involve derivatives of $d_{\text{alg}}$, which are regularized by $\varepsilon_d > 0$.
1048: 
1049: :::{prf:lemma} Third Derivative of Localization Weights
1050: :label: lem-weight-third-derivative
1051: 
1052: The localization weights $w_{ij}(\rho) = K_\rho(x_i, x_j) / Z_i(\rho)$ where $Z_i(\rho) = \sum_{\ell \in A_k} K_\rho(x_i, x_\ell)$ satisfy:
1053: $$
1054: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} w_{ij}(\rho)\| \le C_{w,3}(\rho)
1055: $$
1056: 
1057: where
1058: $$
1059: C_{w,3}(\rho) := \frac{C_{\nabla^3 K}(\rho)}{\rho^3} + \frac{12 C_{\nabla K}(\rho) C_{\nabla^2 K}(\rho)}{\rho^3} + \frac{16 C_{\nabla K}(\rho)^3}{\rho^3}
1060: $$
1061:

items.label: lem-mean-third-derivative
items.title: k-Uniform Third Derivative of Localized Mean (Full Model)
items.content:
1152: :label: lem-mean-third-derivative
1153: 
1154: The localized mean for the companion-dependent model $\mu_\rho^{(i)} := \sum_{j \in \mathcal{A}} w_{ij}(\rho) \, d_j$ (where $d_j = \mathbb{E}[d_{\text{alg}}(j, c(j))]$) satisfies:
1155: $$
1156: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} \mu_\rho^{(i)}\| \leq K_{\mu,3}(\rho, \varepsilon_d, \varepsilon_c)
1157: $$
1158: 
1159: where $C_{d,m}$ denote constants from the bounds $\|\nabla^m d_j\|$ (from Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-derivative-locality-c3`), and:
1160: 
1161: $$
1162: K_{\mu,3}(\rho, \varepsilon_d, \varepsilon_c) := C_{d,3} \varepsilon_d^{-2} + \frac{6 C_{d,2} \varepsilon_d^{-1} C_{\nabla K}(\rho)}{\rho} k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)} + \frac{6 C_{d,1} C_{\nabla^2 K}(\rho)}{\rho^2} k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)} + 2 D_{\max} C_{w,3}(\rho) k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}
1163: $$
1164: 
1165: **Note on $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}$ dependence**: The last three terms (those involving weight derivatives) scale with $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)} \leq C_{\text{vol}} \rho_{\max} \rho^{2d}$. When $C_{w,3}(\rho) = O(\rho^{-3})$, the bound scales as $K_{\mu,3} = O(\varepsilon_d^{-2}) + O(\rho^{2d-1}) + O(\rho^{2d-2}) + O(\rho^{2d-3})$, matching Document 20's $m=3$ formula.
items.raw_directive:
1149: ### 5.1. Third Derivative of Localized Mean (Companion-Dependent Model)
1150: 
1151: :::{prf:lemma} k-Uniform Third Derivative of Localized Mean (Full Model)
1152: :label: lem-mean-third-derivative
1153: 
1154: The localized mean for the companion-dependent model $\mu_\rho^{(i)} := \sum_{j \in \mathcal{A}} w_{ij}(\rho) \, d_j$ (where $d_j = \mathbb{E}[d_{\text{alg}}(j, c(j))]$) satisfies:
1155: $$
1156: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} \mu_\rho^{(i)}\| \leq K_{\mu,3}(\rho, \varepsilon_d, \varepsilon_c)
1157: $$
1158: 
1159: where $C_{d,m}$ denote constants from the bounds $\|\nabla^m d_j\|$ (from Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-derivative-locality-c3`), and:
1160: 
1161: $$
1162: K_{\mu,3}(\rho, \varepsilon_d, \varepsilon_c) := C_{d,3} \varepsilon_d^{-2} + \frac{6 C_{d,2} \varepsilon_d^{-1} C_{\nabla K}(\rho)}{\rho} k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)} + \frac{6 C_{d,1} C_{\nabla^2 K}(\rho)}{\rho^2} k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)} + 2 D_{\max} C_{w,3}(\rho) k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}
1163: $$
1164: 
1165: **Note on $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)}$ dependence**: The last three terms (those involving weight derivatives) scale with $k_{\text{eff}}^{(\rho)} \leq C_{\text{vol}} \rho_{\max} \rho^{2d}$. When $C_{w,3}(\rho) = O(\rho^{-3})$, the bound scales as $K_{\mu,3} = O(\varepsilon_d^{-2}) + O(\rho^{2d-1}) + O(\rho^{2d-2}) + O(\rho^{2d-3})$, matching Document 20's $m=3$ formula.
1166:

items.label: lem-variance-third-derivative
items.title: k-Uniform Third Derivative of Localized Variance (Full Model)
items.content:
1276: :label: lem-variance-third-derivative
1277: 
1278: The localized variance for the companion-dependent model $V_\rho^{(i)} := \sigma^2_\rho[f_k, x_i] = \sum_{j \in \mathcal{A}} w_{ij}(\rho) d_j^2 - (\mu_\rho^{(i)})^2$ (where $d_j = \mathbb{E}[d_{\text{alg}}(j, c(j))]$) satisfies:
1279: $$
1280: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} V_\rho^{(i)}\| \leq K_{V,3}(\rho, \varepsilon_d, \varepsilon_c)
1281: $$
1282: 
1283: where $K_{V,3}(\rho, \varepsilon_d, \varepsilon_c)$ is a k-uniform constant (explicit formula in proof).
items.raw_directive:
1273: 
1274: 
1275: :::{prf:lemma} k-Uniform Third Derivative of Localized Variance (Full Model)
1276: :label: lem-variance-third-derivative
1277: 
1278: The localized variance for the companion-dependent model $V_\rho^{(i)} := \sigma^2_\rho[f_k, x_i] = \sum_{j \in \mathcal{A}} w_{ij}(\rho) d_j^2 - (\mu_\rho^{(i)})^2$ (where $d_j = \mathbb{E}[d_{\text{alg}}(j, c(j))]$) satisfies:
1279: $$
1280: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} V_\rho^{(i)}\| \leq K_{V,3}(\rho, \varepsilon_d, \varepsilon_c)
1281: $$
1282: 
1283: where $K_{V,3}(\rho, \varepsilon_d, \varepsilon_c)$ is a k-uniform constant (explicit formula in proof).
1284:

items.label: lem-patch-chain-rule
items.title: Chain Rule for Regularized Standard Deviation
items.content:
1439: :label: lem-patch-chain-rule
1440: 
1441: Let $\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}: \mathbb{R}_{\ge 0} \to \mathbb{R}_{>0}$ satisfy Assumption {prf:ref}`assump-c3-patch` ($C^3$ regularity). For a smooth function $V: \mathbb{R}^d \to \mathbb{R}_{\ge 0}$, the composition $h(x) := \sigma\'_{\text{reg}}(V(x))$ has third derivative given by the **Faà di Bruno formula**:
1442: $$
1443: \nabla^3 h = (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'''(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 3} + 3(\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})''(V) \cdot \text{sym}(\nabla V \otimes \nabla^2 V) + (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'(V) \cdot \nabla^3 V
1444: $$
1445: 
1446: where $\text{sym}(\nabla V \otimes \nabla^2 V)$ denotes the symmetrized tensor product (sum over all permutations).
1447: 
1448: More explicitly, using index notation for clarity:
1449: $$
1450: \frac{\partial^3 h}{\partial x_i \partial x_j \partial x_k} = (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'''(V) \frac{\partial V}{\partial x_i} \frac{\partial V}{\partial x_j} \frac{\partial V}{\partial x_k} + (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})''(V) \left[\frac{\partial V}{\partial x_i} \frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial x_j \partial x_k} + \text{perms}\right] + (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'(V) \frac{\partial^3 V}{\partial x_i \partial x_j \partial x_k}
1451: $$
1452: 
1453: **Norm bound:**
1454: $$
1455: \|\nabla^3 h\| \le L_{\sigma\'\'\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot \|\nabla V\|^3 + 3 L_{\sigma\'\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot \|\nabla V\| \cdot \|\nabla^2 V\| + L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot \|\nabla^3 V\|
1456: $$
items.section: ## 6. Third Derivatives of Regularized Standard Deviation
items.raw_directive:
1436: The Z-score denominator involves the regularized standard deviation $\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}(V_\rho^{(i)})$, which is a composition requiring the chain rule.
1437: 
1438: :::{prf:lemma} Chain Rule for Regularized Standard Deviation
1439: :label: lem-patch-chain-rule
1440: 
1441: Let $\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}: \mathbb{R}_{\ge 0} \to \mathbb{R}_{>0}$ satisfy Assumption {prf:ref}`assump-c3-patch` ($C^3$ regularity). For a smooth function $V: \mathbb{R}^d \to \mathbb{R}_{\ge 0}$, the composition $h(x) := \sigma\'_{\text{reg}}(V(x))$ has third derivative given by the **Faà di Bruno formula**:
1442: $$
1443: \nabla^3 h = (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'''(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 3} + 3(\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})''(V) \cdot \text{sym}(\nabla V \otimes \nabla^2 V) + (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'(V) \cdot \nabla^3 V
1444: $$
1445: 
1446: where $\text{sym}(\nabla V \otimes \nabla^2 V)$ denotes the symmetrized tensor product (sum over all permutations).
1447: 
1448: More explicitly, using index notation for clarity:
1449: $$
1450: \frac{\partial^3 h}{\partial x_i \partial x_j \partial x_k} = (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'''(V) \frac{\partial V}{\partial x_i} \frac{\partial V}{\partial x_j} \frac{\partial V}{\partial x_k} + (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})''(V) \left[\frac{\partial V}{\partial x_i} \frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial x_j \partial x_k} + \text{perms}\right] + (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'(V) \frac{\partial^3 V}{\partial x_i \partial x_j \partial x_k}
1451: $$
1452: 
1453: **Norm bound:**
1454: $$
1455: \|\nabla^3 h\| \le L_{\sigma\'\'\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot \|\nabla V\|^3 + 3 L_{\sigma\'\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot \|\nabla V\| \cdot \|\nabla^2 V\| + L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot \|\nabla^3 V\|
1456: $$
1457:

items.label: lem-patch-third-derivative
items.title: Third Derivative Bound for Regularized Standard Deviation
items.content:
1496: :label: lem-patch-third-derivative
1497: 
1498: The regularized standard deviation $\sigma'_{ho}^{(i)} := \sigma'_{	ext{reg}}(V_ho^{(i)})$ satisfies:
1499: $$
1500: \|
abla^3_{x_i} \sigma'_{ho}^{(i)}\| \le L_{\sigma'''_{	ext{reg}}} \cdot (C_{V,
abla}(ho))^3 + 3 L_{\sigma''_{	ext{reg}}} \cdot C_{V,
abla}(ho) \cdot C_{V,
abla^2}(ho) + L_{\sigma'_{	ext{reg}}} \cdot C_{V,
abla^3}(ho)
1501: $$
1502: 
1503: where $C_{V,
abla}(ho)$, $C_{V,
abla^2}(ho)$, $C_{V,
abla^3}(ho)$ are the bounds from Lemmas {prf:ref}`lem-variance-gradient`, {prf:ref}`lem-variance-hessian`, and {prf:ref}`lem-variance-third-derivative` (the latter two from Appendix A of [11_geometric_gas.md](11_geometric_gas.md) and Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-variance-third-derivative` above).
items.section: ## 6. Third Derivatives of Regularized Standard Deviation
items.raw_directive:
1493: :::
1494: 
1495: :::{prf:lemma} Third Derivative Bound for Regularized Standard Deviation
1496: :label: lem-patch-third-derivative
1497: 
1498: The regularized standard deviation $\sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)} := \sigma\'_{\text{reg}}(V_\rho^{(i)})$ satisfies:
1499: $$
1500: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}\| \le L_{\sigma\'\'\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot (C_{V,\nabla}(\rho))^3 + 3 L_{\sigma\'\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot C_{V,\nabla}(\rho) \cdot C_{V,\nabla^2}(\rho) + L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} \cdot C_{V,\nabla^3}(\rho)
1501: $$
1502: 
1503: where $C_{V,\nabla}(\rho)$, $C_{V,\nabla^2}(\rho)$, $C_{V,\nabla^3}(\rho)$ are the bounds from Lemmas {prf:ref}`lem-variance-gradient`, {prf:ref}`lem-variance-hessian`, and {prf:ref}`lem-variance-third-derivative` (the latter two from Appendix A of [11_geometric_gas.md](11_geometric_gas.md) and Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-variance-third-derivative` above).
1504:

items.label: lem-zscore-third-derivative
items.title: k-Uniform Third Derivative of Z-Score
items.content:
1527: :label: lem-zscore-third-derivative
1528: 
1529: The Z-score $Z_\rho^{(i)} := Z_\rho[f_k, d, x_i]$ satisfies:
1530: $$
1531: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} Z_\rho^{(i)}\| \le K_{Z,3}(\rho)
1532: $$
1533: 
1534: where $K_{Z,3}(\rho)$ is a k-uniform constant:
1535: $$
1536: \begin{aligned}
1537: K_{Z,3}(\rho) := &\, \frac{1}{\sigma\'_{\min}} \Big[C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho) + 3 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho) \\
1538: &\quad + 3 C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla}(\rho) + 6 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) (C_{v,\nabla}(\rho))^2 \\
1539: &\quad + (d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)) C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho) \Big]
1540: \end{aligned}
1541: $$
1542: 
1543: where:
1544: - $u(x_i) := d_i (companion-dependent measurement) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}$ (numerator)
1545: - $v(x_i) := \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}$ (denominator)
1546: - $C_{u,\nabla^m}(\rho)$ are bounds on $\nabla^m u$ (from measurement and mean)
1547: - $C_{v,\nabla^m}(\rho)$ are bounds on $\nabla^m v$ (from Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-patch-third-derivative`)
1548: - **Numerator bounds**: For $d_i$, use Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-derivative-locality-c3`: $\|\nabla^3 d_i\| \leq C_{d,3} \varepsilon_d^{-2}$ (companion-dependent, k-uniform)
items.raw_directive:
1524: The Z-score $Z_\rho[f_k, d, x_i] = (d_i - \mu_\rho^{(i)}) / \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}$ is a quotient of smooth functions. We now compute its third derivative.
1525: 
1526: :::{prf:lemma} k-Uniform Third Derivative of Z-Score
1527: :label: lem-zscore-third-derivative
1528: 
1529: The Z-score $Z_\rho^{(i)} := Z_\rho[f_k, d, x_i]$ satisfies:
1530: $$
1531: \|\nabla^3_{x_i} Z_\rho^{(i)}\| \le K_{Z,3}(\rho)
1532: $$
1533: 
1534: where $K_{Z,3}(\rho)$ is a k-uniform constant:
1535: $$
1536: \begin{aligned}
1537: K_{Z,3}(\rho) := &\, \frac{1}{\sigma\'_{\min}} \Big[C_{u,\nabla^3}(\rho) + 3 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla^2}(\rho) \\
1538: &\quad + 3 C_{u,\nabla^2}(\rho) C_{v,\nabla}(\rho) + 6 C_{u,\nabla}(\rho) (C_{v,\nabla}(\rho))^2 \\
1539: &\quad + (d_{\max} + C_{\mu,\nabla}(\rho)) C_{v,\nabla^3}(\rho) \Big]
1540: \end{aligned}
1541: $$
1542: 
1543: where:
1544: - $u(x_i) := d_i (companion-dependent measurement) - \mu_\rho^{(i)}$ (numerator)
1545: - $v(x_i) := \sigma'_{\rho}^{(i)}$ (denominator)
1546: - $C_{u,\nabla^m}(\rho)$ are bounds on $\nabla^m u$ (from measurement and mean)
1547: - $C_{v,\nabla^m}(\rho)$ are bounds on $\nabla^m v$ (from Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-patch-third-derivative`)
1548: - **Numerator bounds**: For $d_i$, use Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-derivative-locality-c3`: $\|\nabla^3 d_i\| \leq C_{d,3} \varepsilon_d^{-2}$ (companion-dependent, k-uniform)
1549:
